name: Cassius M. CLAY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Clay v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Cassius M. CLAY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of April, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
847 A.2d 54
Cassius M. CLAY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 15, 2004.
